text: 59|12|Enenral, avarkal (tankal illankaliliruntu) veliyerrappattal, ivarkal avarkalutan veliyera mattarkal. Avarkalai etirttu (evarum) por purintal, avarkalukku utavi puriya munvaravum mattarkal. Munvanta potilum, niccayamaka purankattiye otuvarkal. Pinnar (evaralume) avarkal ettakaiya utaviyum pera mattarkal
